metadata.title: Workout Running Sports Bras for Women High Impact High Support Zip Front Adjustable Shoulder Straps Cross Back Crop Top
features: EXCELLENT QUALITY: This sports bra make of 88% Polyester + 12% Spandex, womens sports bras comfortable and has extra support, high impact sports bras for women is your perfect choice. Recommend Size Up: Based on the feedback we recommend size up for more comfy.
MOISTURE WICKING: Women's sports bras for all around support, sports bras for women high support use of cool comfort fabric wicks away sweat to keep you comfory exercise all day.

FRONT ZIP CLOSURE: Zip front sports bra is designed for easy on and off after you workout, adjustable double shoulder straps also removable and covenience for wash, cross back unique design for breathable, adjustable sports bras soft and quick dry, high elasticity and fits perfectly.

PADDED SPORTS BRA: Workout sports bras for women with non-removable pads for not deformed and fixed, lightweight to wear, for running, yoga, any type of fitness, or everyday use. AGJMXX bra combine fashion, function and performance.
AFTER-SALES SERVICE: If you have any questions, please contact our customer service staff as soon as possible. Add to Cart and Buy Now!!!
description: Welcome to our women's sports bra store, AGJMXX womens sports bra provide healthy and comfortable wear for all women.
Feature
High impact
High impact and full coverage for comfortable
Fixed padded
Green sports bra not removable pads for not deformed and fits perfectly
Cross back
Unique design for breathable
Adjustable shoulder straps
Black sports bra make you thinner
Zip up
Blue sports bra easy on and off after you exercise
Adjustable hem
Red sports bra make you more fit
Q&A
Q1:I’m a 34c in bra size but i usually wear size medium in tops. i also weigh 115 lbs and am 5’6". what size should i get?
A1: I bought a size medium and it fits perfectly. I am 110 lbs and wear a size 34B. The quality is very great. I do a lot of workout and running.
Q2: Do the cups stay in place? i usually prefer non-removable cups to wrangle my d/dd.
A2: Yes, the cups will stay in place.
Q3: How do you recommend washing it?
A3: Wash with cold water then air dry toavoid sun exposure.
Q4:: Does it have hooks to hold it close while zipping it up?
A4: No. It doesn't. It does have a cover like pocket over top of the zipper. Therefore the zipper won't flap around and stay in place.
Q5: Does this bra run small, large, or true to size? Thanks.
A5: I think true to size. The shoulder straps are adjustable so you can make if more for high impact or loosen if you need as much support. I ordered my normal size and fits well.
